content: आह्वयः {@--1@} A name, appellation (as last member of <ab>comp.</ab>); काव्यं रामायणाह्वयं <ls>Rām.</ls>; चक्रसाह्वयं, चरणाह्वयाः; वृद्धेरप्याह्वया इमे <ls>Ak.</ls> {@--2@} A lawsuit arising from a dispute about games with animals, as cock-fighting &c.; (one of the 18 titles of law); पणपूर्वकपक्षिमेषादियोधनं आह्वयः <ls>Rāghavānanda</ls> on <ls>Ms. 8. 7.</ls>
